website_summaries.verdict: Easy to read precision face with day and date function.  Stainless steel bracelet with fold-over clasp with double push-button safety
pros: Workhorse Seiko women's timepiece with clear white face and precise hour and minute markers
cons: Setting day and date is a challenge

customer_reviews.title: A Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: This watch does not hold a charge. After fully charging with a watch charger and upon receipt, the watch has stopped twice in four months! It was supposed to last at 4 months on a full charge. The charger, purchased from Amazon works fine on my watch. Also, date feature is hard to use and has never worked right. Per other reviewers, the factory warranty is useless because Amazon does not fill out the warranty card.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be a great starter watch for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her birthday. I thought this would be a great starter watch for my daughter, The watch does NOT WORK. I let it charge via my lamp because it is a Solar Watch. You would think that it would charge, WRONG!!! I left it charging all day and the watch DID NOT CHARGE!!!! This watch is NOT worth buying!!! Buyer Be Aware. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It is easy to read even though it is smaller than I had planned on ordering. Easy read faces are hard to come by these days because even the large watches have colored faces that are easy to misread in low light situations. The watch looks like what used to be called a nurse's watch because it is so easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: frances

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy watch
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for: classic, sturdy, and functional, with illuminated hands and minute marks. Even better, I never have to replace the battery. I normally buy cheap-ish Timex watches, but this time I wanted something that would last many years. I'm not especially hard on watches, but once I get one I wear it until it falls apart. I think it will take quite awhile for this one to give up the ghost. I did have to remove 2 links, but that's to be expected with this kind of band. I learned how to do it myself by watching YouTube videos.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Becoming disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS WATCH!!! However, I have only had it for a year and now the date and day won't stay accurate. I am literally changing it every day manually. I don't know if there is a way to fix this, but it is a major drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie W

customer_reviews.title: Another great value from Seiko...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife; her first comment was, "It's so light!" She wanted a legible face with numbers at the hour marks and loves the practicality of this watch. I trust the reliability of Seiko and I'm looking forward to see how the solar power performs. I would have paid extra for a sapphire crystal - the Hardlex on my Seikos are all scratched - but I'm sure she will be gentler on her watch than I am on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C. Lu

customer_reviews.title: I've been looking at solar watches for about a year now and this one was on sale and it looked so much like my old Swiss Army Wa
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying a watch every time the battery died. The battery cost about the same as a new watch. I did not buy expensive watches. I've been looking at solar watches for about a year now and this one was on sale and it looked so much like my old Swiss Army Watch, which I loved! so far I"ve had no problems only compliments and OHHHH's when I tell them it's SOLAR and I will never have to buy a battery for this watch again!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Nurse Watch
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding watch. Took a few tries to get the dates to align with midnight but works great, and you can set the days to read in spanish if aligned right! They are in red and are the first 3 letters of the spanish day of the week which I thought was a nice unmentioned feature for those who want it. Doesn't seem to need to charge much, even in a dark corner all night it works the next day with no time lost. Great forever Nurse watch that looks nice even when you aren't working. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Mo

customer_reviews.title: I love my watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch during nursing school after seeing a classmate that had the same one. I had bought several different watches before getting this one and none of them were particularly great. I love that it glows in the dark and I can check the time in a dark patients room when needed. It is very accurate with keeping time and looks great at work and outside of work. I have been using it for 2 years now and it still looks brand new. The adjustable band was easy to take a link out of and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Losing Its Charge
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful, easy to read, and it worked fine for 2 years. Now it’s started to lose time, not just a few minutes, but hours. I’ve recharged it in the sun but it’s not holding a charge. I called Seiko and they said to send it to them with the receipt and they will refund my money. I’ll update this review if that happens. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: WineLady

customer_reviews.title: She limes loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it, accurate, has nice sporty look, water proof (she used it ocean kayaking on Catalina Island), no batteries needed. These beat the seiko kinetic hands down. You can leave it on night stand and ambient light is enough to charge solar recharge system. Seiko Kinetic dies after a couple days. Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this watch today. I had searched for a long time to find a watch that had the day AND date on it. I like the face. Easily removed a link in the band (after watching a youtube video; no instructions on how to do this come with the watch). I really like the idea of the solar powered watch with presumeably little to no battery up keep. So far I really like this watch, and for the price (which was about 60% off suggested manufactured pricing) it's a steal.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, looks great, and solar feature does not lose time.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife about seven months ago. This is the first solar watch for either of us, so we were concerned it might stop charging, particularly when worn normally and not putting it somewhere bright to charge but it has been great and not lost time at all. Also it is good quality and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: ckrug

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape, size, numbers etc of this watch...but it stopped working within warranty last summer—I had it fixed—and then it stopped working again just 6 months later! So I only got 2.5 years of use out of this watch! GRRRRRR!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sarah E. McKibben

customer_reviews.title: JUST PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this watch! I'm a Nursing Assistant student and this watch is exactly what i needed. I love that it's solar powered, has military time, and most importantly, a second hand. The stainless steel band is also a plus for me since it's easy to clean. I have been searching for a long time for this kind of watch and I'm glad I found it. Shipping was fast as well. I just had to remove 3 links to fit my wrist but no complaints at all. I used it straight out of the box and so far so good. I'm so glad i found this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I wanted a solar watch. I am done with watches that run on batteries that constantly need replaced. This one has a nice readable face. Love the look of it. Had to take it to the jeweler to have links taken out, but that's par for the course. Watches are always too huge for my small wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Brschool

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for a nurse!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this her new watch and uses it for work as a nurse. It's great because it withstands water splashes as she is constantly washing her hands. The face is just the right size and easy to read with a good second hand for counting and also includes military time. It would be nice if it could be read in the dark but I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: LumiBrite
customer_reviews.text: Just what u needed. Numbers are clear and can see time in the dark
customer_reviews.author: space invader

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife, she has a half dozen watches but I guess none of them really appealed to her so she didn't wear any of them. When we received the Seiko it was different, the watch looks great and has so many features that she barely takes it off. It was easy to set following the instructions. I'd have to say for the looks, functionality, features &, the 3 year warranty looks like I have a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: very short lifespan for the price
customer_reviews.text: This watch worked well for 16 months, then began losing time. No amount of solar/light exposure was effective to allow it to keep time. A jeweler diagnosed the problem as a bad solar battery, so replaced the battery at a charge of $70. The watch still does not work. An expensive and short lived purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for over 3 years now. I wear it all the time (24/7). It is easy to read and runs great. It keeps time accurately and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great buy. I bought the watch for my wife so that we don't have to worry about changing batteries all the time. Nice looking watch. No problems. Came already set from the seller. All we had to adjust was the time. Now I'll buy one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Tafoya

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than I expected. Also, quality material. I've only used it for a month, but so far, so good. Runs on time. The band was a couple of links larger than my wrist, so I took it to a watch repair shop and had the band adjusted. Fits fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Living in SJ, CA

customer_reviews.title: Great solar watch.  Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Wife wears the watch all the time. No batteries to change. Works great and keeps great time.
customer_reviews.author: Living Up North

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch, I’d by it again and or gift it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! Keeps excellent time and is pretty! Also, doesn’t get damaged if you splash water or it! WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for nursing graduate!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved the watch. It was a gift for her graduation from nursing school. That's why we bought one with second hand.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie G

customer_reviews.title: my watch lasted 1.5yrs only
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch in april 2017 for $115, it stopped working in november 2019. i took it to repair shop and they quoted repair cost of $120- it made no sense to repair it. i thought there was warranty, but there's no warranty. a good brand watch should last many years and definitely more than 1.5yrs.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: product arrived on time and in good condition, its a SEIKO
customer_reviews.text: works well ,was gift for the wife , she likes it ,what can i say , product arrived on time and in good condition, its a SEIKO ,it will last for years im sure as i have had several myself, good quality watch
customer_reviews.author: yup

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. However messing with removing the links to make it fit is a complete PITA. I stabbed my finger with one of the pins by mistake. Somewhere I thought I read that the watch includes a tool kit to remove links, but there were no tools with my watch.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: I liked the fact that it is a solar watch and ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it is a solar watch and the size of the face and the fact that it had both analog numbers and military time numbers and the day and date calendar. It does have the luminous dials but I would have preferred being able to light up the entire watch face to see the time at night.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Tenberg

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! numbers are big enough so I can see them clearly.... the face is just the right size for my small wrists. I've gotten the watch wet while doing dishes, being out in the rain and it still works great! I have not tried it while swimming but I don't doubt it will continue to perform. This is a great product! I wear it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sotomayor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice everyday watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and its a great everyday watch. I have very small wrists so this fits right may be a tad larger than other watches I own but not overly large.
customer_reviews.author: Nausheen M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch. I am a nurse & this works ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. I am a nurse & this works great. Fit was right on. I have a DRAWER full of watches I intend to replace batteries in but never get to. This is solar so no battery. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Seiko brand watches seem to be great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the delivery time of this watch. However, it is a lot smaller than picture online. Not sure if I will keep it!
customer_reviews.author: lizlee

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Watch stopped working. Sent it in for repair. Still under warranty and watch is now missing. It's been 2 months and I haven't heard a thing about it being fixed. No one to contact.
customer_reviews.author: DIETER   K  RISCHKE

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch.
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch very much. The numbers and day/date are easily read. The solar power is an additional plus.
customer_reviews.author: E. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She hasn't taken it off since.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: SAYS IT IS EASY TO READ AND CAN SEE THE DAY AND DATE ...
customer_reviews.text: MY WIFE REALLY LIKES THIS WATCH. SAYS IT IS EASY TO READ AND CAN SEE THE DAY AND DATE REAL EASY
customer_reviews.author: GROUND HOG

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch, well made, easy to read and set. I only with that it had lume on the hands and markers.
customer_reviews.author: 762x51

customer_reviews.title: Practical Everyday Watch
customer_reviews.text: Love my new watch. It was just what I ordered and came a couple of days early. Very practical everyday watch.
customer_reviews.author: VBlady

customer_reviews.title: defective upon arrival....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother-inlaw. She didn't know about solar watches and that they need to be charged before using. However, after I charged it with a 8 hours of sunlight, the watch showed that it had power, but the second hand would stop with-in 5 minutes of setting the watch. Has to be defective. If the power of the charge goes down, the second hand would tick every two seconds. This watch just stopped cold. Doesn't say much for Seiko. Now the question is, do I send it back to Amazon as "defective" and ask for a refund, or do I send it out to Seiko to be fixed?
customer_reviews.author: Glenn W.

customer_reviews.title: Wife Falls In Love
customer_reviews.text: My wife old bang-around watch died, she bought a new one (retail) that 2 days later drowned when she went swimming. I got her the new Seiko and it was love at first site. She loves the look and it seems to love the water both shower and pool. Could not have made a better choice. 😃
customer_reviews.author: john scalice

customer_reviews.title: I love this new Seiko
customer_reviews.text: I love this new Seiko. It replaced an old "Swiss Military" stainless steel watch. I am very hard on watches so we will see if this one holds up as long.
customer_reviews.author: gilnsan01

customer_reviews.title: nice feel and keeps good time
customer_reviews.text: very well made, nice feel and keeps good time. I have had it for 3 weeks. ask me in three years.
customer_reviews.author: lolly joy

customer_reviews.title: it would be very nice if it has the magnifying piece over the date ...
customer_reviews.text: watch looks decent. difficult to see the day and date of the week. it would be very nice if it has the magnifying piece over the date section. i picked this watch over mens because i like the link better however, i made a mistake and didnt check wrist size. it was a bit tight for me and i had to reorder the mens and return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Wen-Chi Chang

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, simple, and comes with a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely watch for a very reasonable price. The only downside of this item is the day and date setting tends to stop if it's not been exposed to the light or direct sunlight for even a short period of time. Other than that, I have no complaint. The seller fulfilled their commitment to send it on time, and the watch came with a very nice box with instructions manual in it. The watch has a simple design, and I think it would work well for my job although, I kind a wish that Seiko also has that night light feature like Timex.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela SJTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Light Speed Time!
customer_reviews.text: Great Seiko quality as usual, gifted to my wife because her other watches batteries would go dead all the time. Now this solar charged watch will last for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Bama Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but too "busy"!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice watch, but the face is too "busy" and distracting with the red military time numbers. I sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Debcatz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. I have a more expensive one, but I needed a watch that I could see. Now I can read the numbers. Also, happy I can take it to the beach, and won't have to replace a battery and loose the water seal.
customer_reviews.author: Mari MP

customer_reviews.title: loved its railroad dial with the 24 hours highlighted in ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present. The Mrs. loved its railroad dial with the 24 hours highlighted in red. And, its a genuine Seiko solar time-piece with a 3-year manufacturer's warranty. Great buy at a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J - LAS VEGAS

customer_reviews.title: A great time piece!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new watch! It's like me solar powered... Good looking, easy to read face, and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Reader07

customer_reviews.title: I've only ever been happy with Seiko
customer_reviews.text: I've only ever been happy with Seiko. My glass face is scratched but then I'm a rough and tumble kind of person.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful watch. Beautiful, resistant, strong and light. Works with precision. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Livia Mesencio Barini Shiraishi

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I had one just about like it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I had one just about like it (the face was a little smaller) and it lasted me 31 years! I like the bigger face on this one. I can see it better.
customer_reviews.author: Tbach

customer_reviews.title: You can read it easy, an it fits great.
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this watch. I am in the health field and it’s perfect. You can read it easy, it can go in water. I just LOVE it. I am thinking about getting a second on, just to have if need be in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ann Andros

customer_reviews.title: Still looks flawless
customer_reviews.text: Wear my watch every single day and years later, still works perfectly and looks like new! Very happy with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cary

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Easy to read, practical, straight-forward timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: Hyacinth

customer_reviews.title: easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for work. She loves it because it's simple, easy to read, and light. Plus it's awesome that it's solar. Hasn't died yet.
customer_reviews.author: Croapino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Numbers are big enough to read, very stylish. Keeps good time.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Turner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work
customer_reviews.text: I love my new watch! It is exactly what I need as a flight attendant: durable, waterproof, and shows the 24 hour clock. I only wish it had a glow feature, but other than that, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: micaelasmom

customer_reviews.title: A good watch for RNs.
customer_reviews.text: I am a nurse. This watch has everything I need in a watch. It is beautiful. I have had Seiko watches for years and they are sturdy, dependable, stylish watches. Thank you Seiko for making this watch.
customer_reviews.author: jss

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, typical Seiko watch. Solar so no battery worries. Gift and recipient is pleased.
customer_reviews.author: zylex

customer_reviews.title: Just what Wife wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Only thing is, because she is disabled, we are hoping we can fit this with a compatibly wide Speidel band.
customer_reviews.author: James Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and basic watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and basic watch. Very classic look. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Nepa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I wanted a watch with numbers on it & this is perfect. It's also very lightweight. It arrived on time, with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in a timely manner I am a Seiko ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a timely manner I am a Seiko fan I bought it for my wife and she really likes it
customer_reviews.author: Martin Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Nice design and just the right size -- neither too small to read nor too big to wear. My one and only problem is that the instructions were poorly written and hard to follow. I am still trying to figure out how to change the date. Strange but true
customer_reviews.author: Duck Soup

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. It was really easy to set up! Just make sure you read the instructions. The day and date is very small but it doesn't bother me. It's a little big on me but it feels secure and I haven't decided whether to have links removed.
customer_reviews.author: T Hamann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch and easy to read. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, easy to read watch. I've always bought Seiko watches. This is my fourth or fifth Seiko watch.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Reed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, the clasp, and the way it fits me. A great watch.
customer_reviews.author: CA-Claire

customer_reviews.title: Face is a littler smaller than expected but I love the clear easy to ready numbers and day + ...
customer_reviews.text: Face is a littler smaller than expected but I love the clear easy to ready numbers and day + date display. Have showered and swam with this without issue. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my Daughter, she is a R ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my Daughter, she is a R.N. and the military time is what they use. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: T. N.

customer_reviews.title: Great flight attendant watch
customer_reviews.text: Great flight attendant watch! Easy to see numbers, not too heavy. The feel and quality just amaze at this price.
customer_reviews.author: david l

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my watch, beautiful and stylish. Never needs to change the battery!!
customer_reviews.author: lis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful: easy to read and wear!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Looks great, easy to read, accurate and no batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R.

customer_reviews.title: Seiko Women's SUT167
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch from Seiko. My eyes are bad and I can actually see the numbers and hands on the watch. Glad it is water resistant to 100M, so I don't have to worry about getting the watch wet.Solar powered so no more batteries to change. The hands and points of the numbers will glow in the dark. I little bit big so I had to have 3 links removed but it is perfect. Great price and speedy delivery. Hopefully will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Glowing review!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Nice size face, glows in dark, clear numbers, and a Seiko.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. No more battery needed. Just what I need at work!
customer_reviews.author: Ana R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife, she loves it. Great quality and price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big dial is easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Big dial is easy to read. Date and day of week change randomly - often to language other than english.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read dial. It's great not to need batteries!
customer_reviews.author: K T GREEN

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled that I was able to find this watch. The numbers are easy to read, and I wanted military time which this watch has. The wrist band is a little big and I will take it to the jewlers to have a couple links removed.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON

customer_reviews.title: ... in before i ordered it - (wanted her to like it before I ordered it ) guess shes going ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present for my wife -that i got her involved in before i ordered it - (wanted her to like it before I ordered it ) guess shes going to get it a bit early becasue she needs a watch . Japanese Seikos in my opinion are one of the best values and watchs out their. Fair price - very nice watch , very clean case A+++
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It is a perfect size, not too small or big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatwatch! Very clear dials
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Very clear dials, etc. Dials light up nice when exposed to enough light.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Elhard

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, readible, quality watch
customer_reviews.text: GREAT watch. Easy to read and reliable as a Seiko always is!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: I liked the lightness of the watch when I put in ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the lightness of the watch when I put in my wrist, but I was dissapointed when I wore it night becuase Its hard to see the luminous hand
customer_reviews.author: Emiller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read - love the day and date feature ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read - love the day and date feature - so important for shiftwork. Especially like the quick release clasp on the bracelet that allows easy removal. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tpatterson369

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this watch for people who are visually challenged.  Very difficult to read face
customer_reviews.text: This watch has a face that is difficult to see for visually challenged people. The day/date could not be read without a magnifying glass. The day/date was a challenge to set.
customer_reviews.author: Janet RArnold

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for senior citizens!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and clear, my mom can read the dial easily. Good for older generation. Hopefully watch battery last more than 3 years as claim by manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: JeanStephenSHH

customer_reviews.title: The shipping service so far has been excellent. However
customer_reviews.text: The watch arrived quickly. The shipping service so far has been excellent. However, what I have learned that bothers me a little is that between the hours of 12 AM and 3 AM, when the weekday is changing, it switches to Spanish before it goes back to English. Am I asleep during those hours? No. This is why that matters. It threw me off a little when I was trying to set the watch correctly. When I finally figured out what was happening, I was fed up.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Temple

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat cheap looking dial, but overall okay watch
customer_reviews.text: The face looks a bit cheap and the hands weren't perfectly flat. But my wife likes it, so it's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: my wife loves it since I bought it for her ...
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves it since I bought it for her for her birthday. she says its what she needs and uses it every day.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Seiko makes great watches. This is my first solar watch and I couldn't be more pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Cafaro

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty like at the first look
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty like at the first look , then i found there is a flaw on the watch frame ,even it is tiny . I am on travel.... the seller must know that already, bad!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could tell the time in the dark. ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could tell the time in the dark. I would have never bought it if I knew that. Already wore it. So I can't return it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: defective cheapo
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival. The battery didn't work at all. Had it retirned.
customer_reviews.author: felix dynin

product_meta.title: Seiko Women's SUT167 Solar Stainless Steel Bracelet Watch
product_meta.description:
From Humble beginnings, Kintaro Hattori’s Vision for Seiko has become reality. A consuming passion for excellence - imprinted in our Corporate DNA passed from generation to generation. Seiko, for 125 years committed to the art and science of time.

 A culture of innovation connects a 19th century Tokyo clock shop with 20th century advances in timekeeping to an extraordinary 21st century "quiet revolution." Continually driven by dedication and passion, established a multitude of world’s first technologies… transforming the principles of timekeeping. 

 The first quartz wristwatch – changed the history of time. 

 The first Kinetic – marked a new era in quartz watch technology. 

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing. 

 1984, another celebrated first – Kinetic Technology – powered by body movement. 

 Kinetic – a quartz mechanism with unparalleled accuracy –the driving force behind more world’s firsts. 

 Kinetic Chronograph – the next generation of high performance timekeeping. 

 Kinetic Auto Relay – automatically resets to the correct time. 

 Kinetic Perpetual - combining the date perfect technology of perpetual calendar with the genius of Kinetic Auto Relay. 

 And now Kinetic Direct Drive – move, and the watch is powered automatically. Or hand wind it and see the power you are generating in real time. 

 In the realm of fine watches, time is measured by Seiko innovation – A heritage of dedication to the art and science of time.



Seiko Solar. No battery change required and powered by all types of light. Solar cell with high performance electricity generation. Energy-efficient movement with a 6 month power reserve. This sporty dress watch has a stainless steel case and bracelet featuring a railroad style white dial with luminous hands and markers. Day and date calendar. 100 meters water resistant.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :6 x 8 x 6 inches; 6.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :SUT167
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :July 9, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Seiko
 * ASIN :B00LN319CQ

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #970,040 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #439215 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #5181 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.1 out of 5 stars149 ratings

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing. 

 1984, another celebrated first – Kinetic Technology – powered by body movement.

 In the realm of fine watches, time is measured by Seiko innovation – A heritage of dedication to the art and science of time.



Seiko Solar. No battery change required and powered by all types of light. Solar cell with high performance electricity generation. Energy-efficient movement with a 6 month power reserve. This sporty dress watch has a stainless steel case and bracelet featuring a railroad style white dial with luminous hands and markers. Day and date calendar. 100 meters water resistant.
feature_bullets: Solar-powered watch featuring easy-to-read dial with dual time tracks and day/date window
28.5-mm stainless steel case with hardlex dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Stainless steel bracelet with fold-over clasp with double push-button safety
Water resistant to 100 m (330 ft): In general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not scuba diving
